ISSUE.TITLE: Quick Import - AIRTABLE (Cannot read property 'length' of undefined)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
### Discussed in https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/discussions/3925
Originally posted by **kmataeh23** October 4, 2022 Hi Nocodb team. I am trying to import an air table to noco using its api key and shared base ID but am getting a "cannot read property 'length' of undefined" error in the logs section. Any advice on a workaround for this error?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4703 from nocodb/refactor/create-project refactor(gui): remove dropdown for create project from project list page

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: proper error if provided url is not shared base Re #3927 Signed-off-by: mertmit <mertmit99@gmail.com>
